conversion_verification.notes: The second image is rendered with materials/shadows but shown in an essentially pure top-down view; wall vertical faces/height are not perceptible and the scene reads as a stylized 2D plan rather than an angled 3D cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Automatic rejection: pure top-down orthographic-like view and no clearly visible wall height/vertical faces.

detected_errors.description: Not a true 3D cutaway conversion: camera is essentially top-down with no clear wall height/side faces; fails mandatory angled/isometric 3D perception requirement.

summary: The output reads as a top-down rendered plan rather than an angled 3D cutaway with clearly visible wall height and multiple wall surfaces.
